creator: koi_san@japan.interq.or.jp
text:
(Batik 1.5beta4)
If stroke-dasharray is used, the same result is not brought by line and path.
e.g.
<line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="100" stroke-dasharray="8 8" />
<path d="M 0 0 v 100 z" stroke-dasharray="8 8" />

by a adding a 'z' command, the path goes from (0,0) to (0, 100) and then goes 
back. So the dashed line is different. FIX: remove the 'z' command.
creator: tkormann@apache.org
